panel__settings__credentials__subheader.message: Quick-connect authentication is only partially supported.

panel__settings__credentials__auto_login.message: Attempts to auto-login if credentials are valid and remember me is enabled.

panel__settings__credentials__general__s.message: General credentials for local and quick-connect authentications

panel__settings__credentials__quick_conn.message: Note that quick-connect login is in alpha, the connection might not be stable and might require manual login.
Note that quick-connect url might change unexpectedly. As such, re-login after service worker sleep might fail, and a manual login might be required.

panel__settings__credentials__2fa__subhe.message: Credentials for Two factor authentication credentials.

panel__settings__credentials__2fa__warni.message: Note that login is required every time the extension is reloaded if device token is not set, regardless of the remember me current setting.

panel__settings__credentials__auth_v6__w.message: Note that remember my device in two factor authentication is only available for DSM6+.
